answers.answer: The rectal bleeding should be ruled out, although it could be from Hemorrhoids. Maybe a vitamin deficiency for the other issues?

question: Hi I'm 21yo since 2011 I have rectal bleedingDizzy imbalance when I walk and fatigueRuled out diabetes/thyroid/gluten/anemiaCan they be related or not?I don't smoke nor drink alcoholI sleep earlyI'm thin not obeseWhat's wrong which tests shall I do
title: 21yo since 2011 chronic rectal bleeding/dizzy when walk and fatigue help
